criteria: Identification of Short-Term Goals Related to Abstinence and Reproductive/Sexual Health
Identification of Long-Term Goals Related to Abstinence and Reproductive/Sexual Health
Understanding and Identification of FDA-Approved Condoms and Other Contraceptives for Pregnancy and STD Prevention
Clarity and Accuracy of Information Presented
descriptions: Does not identify any short-term goals related to abstinence and reproductive/sexual health.
Identifies one vague or inaccurate short-term goal.
Identifies one relevant short-term goal but lacks detail or clarity.
Identifies two relevant short-term goals with some detail.
Identifies three relevant short-term goals with clear and specific details.
Identifies multiple relevant short-term goals with comprehensive details, demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
Does not identify any long-term goals related to abstinence and reproductive/sexual health.
Identifies one vague or inaccurate long-term goal.
Identifies one relevant long-term goal but lacks detail or clarity.
Identifies two relevant long-term goals with some detail.
Identifies three relevant long-term goals with clear and specific details.
Identifies multiple relevant long-term goals with comprehensive details, demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
Demonstrates no understanding or identification of FDA-approved condoms and other contraceptives.
Identifies one method inaccurately or with significant misunderstanding.
Identifies one method correctly but provides limited information.
Identifies two methods correctly with some detail regarding their use for pregnancy and STD prevention.
Identifies multiple methods correctly with clear details regarding their use for both pregnancy and STD prevention.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of various FDA-approved methods, explaining their effectiveness, proper usage, and limitations in preventing pregnancy and STDs.
Information presented is unclear, inaccurate, or irrelevant to the topic.
Information presented contains inaccuracies or lacks clarity in several areas.
Information presented is mostly accurate but may have some minor inaccuracies or lack of clarity.
Information presented is accurate and clear with only minor areas for improvement.
Information presented is accurate, clear, and well-organized, demonstrating a good understanding of the concepts.
Information presented is exceptionally clear, accurate, and insightful, demonstrating a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of the concepts.
